  • nodeMatchesPattern

Function nodeMatchesPattern

  • nodeMatchesPattern(node: undefined | null | Node, pattern: Pattern<PatternBlock>): boolean

  • Check if a node matches with a pattern.

    This only checks the current node (and its children), but not the next node (since you can also only pass one pattern).

    Parameters

    • node: undefined | null | Node

      The node to match.

    • pattern: Pattern<PatternBlock>

      The pattern to match the node to.

    Returns boolean

    • Defined in packages/core/src/matcher/node-matcher.ts:185
